original_text: And the people of Israel again did what was evil in the sight of the Lord after Ehud died.
korean_text: 에훗이 죽으니 이스라엘 자손이 또 여호와의 목전에 악을 행하매

sentences.original_text: And the people of Israel again did what was evil in the sight of the Lord
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 이스라엘 백성은 다시 주의 보시기에 악을 행하였으니
